title: Little Mouse
author: Little Mouse
created_time: October 03, 2023, 05:23:34 PMLast edit: October 12, 2023, 03:14:13 AM by Little Mouse
content: Cryptoplay.io is looking for a few active members to advertise their brand among the bitcointalk community. If you are frequently active in the gambling section, we are looking for you, and feel free to apply.Payment in BTC9x Hero/Legendary- $10010x Sr Member- $7010x Full Member- $40Every week, we will reward $25 to 1 user with the best post quality.Campaign Rules1. Post-bursting isn't allowed, also, you can't post half of the post count in a day. Be usual, be a forum member. I have the right to deny any of your posts as eligible.2. A minimum of 5 posts in Gambling and/or Gambling Discussion is required per week to be eligible for the payment.3. A minimum of 25 posts per week will make you eligible for the payment.4. Posts in Altcoin Discussion, Off-topic, Games and Rounds, Investor-based games,  Invites & Accounts, Archival, Politics and Society, and any other signature/bounty campaign thread along with boards/threads where signature isn't displayed, won't be counted towards weekly post counts.5. A weekly maximum of 5 posts will be counted on the local board.6. Post in Cryptoplay's ANN thread isn't mandatory to get paid but feedback on the casino in their ANN thread would be appreciated.7. You must have 5 earned merits in the last 120 days to apply. The only exception is if I invite you.8. You, a person, are not allowed to enroll with more than one account.9. Each week will start on Thursday and end on Wednesday UTC 23:59:59.10. I and Cryptoplay reserve the right to pause the campaign at any time.11. If you are accepted, please wear signature, avatar, and personal text. Check out the spreadsheet whether your information is correct or not.SIGNATUREHERO / LEGENDARY
